name: Corroy 92.75' Natural Linen Sofa
details: Built on a thin frame, Italian-inspired sofa brings a sense of lightness despite its oversized proportions. Transitioning easily between formal and informal settings, the sofa's slim silhouette and seamless armrests offer a modern aesthetic, while flange-trimmed linen upholstery in a tonal neutral nods to more traditional influences. CB2 exclusive.

name: Corroy Natural Linen Chair and a Half
details: Built on a thin frame, Italian-inspired chair and a half brings a sense of lightness despite its oversized proportions. Transitioning easily between formal and informal settings, the chair's clean lines and slim silhouette offer a modern aesthetic, while flange-trimmed linen upholstery in a tonal neutral nods to more traditional influences. Seamless armrests and super-soft loose cushions make it a perfect spot to curl up. CB2 exclusive.
